posts.post_content:
Sold a few and still have quite a few to go!  Roughly 460 cards remaining, each graded SGC.  Sorry if I've missed anyone over the last couple of weeks...  Scans and an updated spreadsheet are available upon request.  Please e-mail [url]bowen@bowenlaw.us[/url] for requests.  Thanks.

Marty

Hi Marty,

I'm looking for a Matty dark cap with a polar bear, cycle or EDPG back. Long shot i know, but figured I'd ask what back your Matty dark cap has. Thanks for your time.

Dean

Getting lots of requests, taking them in order.  Will get to everyone directly!

Marty

Marty,

Email sent, thanks in advance!

Hi Marty,

I am looking for NY Nationals (Giants) Graded between 3 and 4. Lower grades are fine too, if they are unique backs. Curious what you have!

Regards,

Isaiah
Interested in Niles,Smith (Boston version), tubby spencer and speaker

Hey Marty,

I had emailed you about a list and then followed up for some pics, is that possible?

Thanks!
